queries.command: aws ec2 describe-instances --query 'Reservations[].Instances[].{ Id:InstanceId, Name: Tags[?Key==`Name`].Value | [0], Type:InstanceType, PrivateIpAddress:PrivateIpAddress, PublicIpAddress:PublicIpAddress }' --output json
aws ec2 describe-instances --query 'Reservations[].Instances[].{ Id:InstanceId, Name: Tags[?Key==`Name`].Value | [0], VPC:VpcId, Subnet:SubnetId }' --output json

aws ec2 describe-instances --query 'Reservations[].Instances[].{ Id:InstanceId, Name: Tags[?Key==`Name`].Value | [0], SecurityGroupIds:SecurityGroups[*].GroupId, SecurityGroupNames:SecurityGroups[*].GroupName }' --output json

aws rds describe-db-instances --query 'DBInstances[].{ Id:DBInstanceIdentifier, Name: DBInstanceIdentifier, DBInstanceClass:DBInstanceClass, Engine:Engine, EngineVersion:EngineVersion, DBInstanceStatus:DBInstanceStatus, Storage:AllocatedStorage }' --output json
aws rds describe-db-instances --query 'DBInstances[].{ Id:DBInstanceIdentifier, Name: DBInstanceIdentifier, Endpoint:join(`:`, [Endpoint.Address, to_string(Endpoint.Port)]) }' --output json
aws route53 list-hosted-zones --query 'HostedZones[].{ Id:Id, Name:Name, ResourceRecordSetCount:ResourceRecordSetCount }' --output json
